Test.Name: Correct respons: 1 ASC, 1 MediaProfile

Test.Name: Correct respons
Test.Description: To verify retrieving of complete Audio Source Configuration List, Audio Source Configuration by Configuration token and compatible Audio Source Configuration by Profile token

Test.Name: Incorrect Response: 1st GetAudioSourceConfigurations

Test.Description: 2nd audioSourceConfList contains more than one item
